justification: Proposal misreads Team B: they prefer workhorse RBs and consistency, yet A offers a committee RB plus a high-variance deep-threat WR, and asks for an injured RB despite B’s tendency to buy, not sell, injuries. Value is lopsided (Tier 3 RB + Tier 3 WR for Tier 4 RB). Rationale is contradictory and mislabeled, and p_accept is unrealistic. Limited, error-prone ToM and weak, unclear justification.
